TopicTitle: Looking for a Lander+ Apollo Style Rover

Articles.Content:
I can't get a good lander and rover to get to Mun and Minmus. I can easily make a rocket to get to the moons without a rover but since 0.20 came out I want to have a rover with the new seat and a lander like apollo but with no docking because I suck at docking. And I want the rover and lander to be the same ship not seperate ships.

Edited May 24, 2013 by tygoo7

You want a lander, that IS a rover, capable of landing and then returning to kerbin, without docking?

"like Apollo" refers in itself to the efficiency of sending one part to the moon, only taking half of it back up into orbit and then only sending the crew back home. The approach you're looking for has nothing whatsoever to do with apollo.

If you're serious in what you want, then start from the opposite end. Consider what you need from Mun to Kerbin, then what's needed to get that off the surface of Mun, add drive capability, then landing capability for that assembly, Munar insertion, kerbin escape, kerbin orbit, kerbin launch.

Utterly ridicilous at best, if you ask me.

Spaceflight isn't for everyone...
No I mean a lander with a rover like what apollo has once it has landed. And thanks for the tips
